name: Dialog
description: Dialog is a container to display content in an overlay window.

visible.label: visible
visible.title: Specifies the visibility of the dialog.

modal.label: modal
modal.title: Defines if background should be blocked when dialog is displayed.

close-on-escape.label: closeOnEscape
close-on-escape.title: Specifies if pressing escape key should hide the dialog.

dismissable-mask.label: dismissableMask
dismissable-mask.title: Specifies if clicking the modal background should hide the dialog.

position.label: position
position.title: Position of the dialog, options are "center", "top", "bottom", "left", "right", "topleft", "topright", "bottomleft" or "bottomright".

content-class.label: contentClass
content-class.title: Style class of the content section.

rtl.label: rtl
rtl.title: When enabled dialog is displayed in RTL direction.

closable.label: closable
closable.title: Adds a close icon to the header to hide the dialog.

show-header.label: showHeader
show-header.title: Whether to show the header or not.

block-scroll.label: blockScroll
block-scroll.title: Whether background scroll should be blocked when dialog is visible.

base-z-index.label: baseZIndex
base-z-index.title: Base zIndex value to use in layering.

aria-close-label.label: ariaCloseLabel
aria-close-label.title: Aria label of the close icon.

maximizable.label: maximizable
maximizable.title: Whether the dialog can be displayed full screen.

breakpoints.label: breakpoints
breakpoints.title: Object literal to define widths per screen size.

draggable.label: draggable
draggable.title: Whether the dialog can be relocated by dragging.

min-x.label: minX
min-x.title: Minimum value for the left coordinate of dialog in dragging.

min-y.label: minY
min-y.title: Minimum value for the top coordinate of dialog in dragging.

keep-in-viewport.label: keepInViewport
keep-in-viewport.title: Keeps dialog in the viewport when dragging.

append-to.label: appendTo
append-to.title: A valid query selector or an HTMLElement to specify where the dialog gets attached. Special keywords are "body" for document body and "self" for the element itself.

pt.label: pt
pt.title: Used to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

unstyled.label: unstyled
unstyled.title: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.

slots.name: header
slots.title: Custom content for the component's header

slots.name: footer
slots.title: Custom content for the component's footer

slots.name: maximizeicon
slots.title: Custom maximizeicon icon template of dialog.

events.name: hide
events.title: Callback to invoke when dialog is hidden.

events.name: after-hide
events.title: Callback to invoke after dialog is hidden.

events.name: show
events.title: Callback to invoke when dialog is showed.

events.name: maximize
events.title: Fired when a dialog gets maximized.

events.name: unmaximize
events.title: Fired when a dialog gets unmaximized.

events.name: dragend
events.title: Fired when a dialog drag completes.
